1039130.name: Fantasy Grounds - Odds & Ends, Volume 15 (Token Pack)
1039130.description:
Odds & Ends, Volume 15

With Monster Grin's Odds & Ends token packs, it might sometimes be random, but it's always gonna be awesome! Take these 176 unique, artfully designed and stunning tokens for instance: awesome and detailed figures from across genre and time! If you're looking to add some variation to your game or to your party, be sure and pick up these tokens, which include sneaky goblin assassins, stalwart human wayfinders, frightening iron wrights, and much more!
Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of what's what and who's who. Also, with Monster Grin's new Altered States tokens, you can get maximum value from each and every token in this pack and really add that special something to your game!
This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, and silver, as well as ethereal, invisible, stone-skinned, sand-skinned, and altered state versions):
  • Goblin Assassin
  • Male Halfbeast
  • Human Barbarian
  • Human Paladin
  • Human Wayfinder
  • Iron Wright
  • Jesulan
  • Wereowl
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
